law.catch_line: Any licensee or his officer or employee who knowingly violates any provision of §§ 12-303 through ...
law.text: Any licensee or his officer or employee who knowingly violates any provision of §§ 12-303 through 12-306, § 12-308, § 12-311, § 12-313, or § 12-314 of this subtitle is guilty of a misdemeanor and on conviction is subject to a fine not exceeding $500 or imprisonment not exceeding 6 months or both.
